tooltip.average: Automatically calculated, average grade of all assignment grades assessed. Teacher may adjust this grade depending on activity and behaviour grades.
tooltip.proposed: Manually selected by the teacher, proposed grade for this subject. It was selected based on the average assignment grade visible above as well as activity and behaviour grades.
tooltip.final: Manually selected by the teacher, final grade for this subject. This grade is definitive and cannot be modified.

task.taskMessagePlaceholder: Type your answer or leave additional comment...

tooltip.cannotSubmitPastDeadline: Deadline has passed, you can no longer submit a solution.

error.FILE_TOO_BIG: The file is too large. Max size allowed is {{ maxSize }}/
error.EMAIL_TAKEN: This e-mail is already in use.
